languages.text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.
languages.original_text: До конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдата каждая его атака по площади наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный числу целей в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of the Marksman's turn, each of their area attacks deals additional damage equal to the number of attacked targets.
Until the end of the Marksman's turn, each of their area attacks deals additional damage equal to the number of attacked targets.

Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

languages.text: До конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} солдата каждая его атака по площади наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный числу целей в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: До конца хода стрелка каждая его атака по области наносит дополнительный урон, равный числу целей в области действия.
До конца хода стрелка каждая его атака по области наносит дополнительный урон, равный числу целей в области действия.

languages.text: 直到士兵{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，士兵的每次{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}都会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害值等同于攻击的目标数量。
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: 直到士兵{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，士兵的每次{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}都会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害值等同于攻击的目标数量。

languages.text: Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del soldado, cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} inflige tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional como el número de objetivos atacados.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del tirador de élite, cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} inflige tanto daño adicional como el número de objetivos atacados.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Soldaten fügt jeder seiner {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe der Anzahl der angegriffenen Ziele zu.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Scharfschützen fügt jeder seiner {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} entsprechend der Anzahl der angegriffenen Ziele zusätzlichen Schaden zu.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du soldat, chacune de ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal au nombre de cibles attaquées.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Tireur d'Élite, chacune de ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} inflige un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal au nombre de cibles attaquées.

languages.text: 兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が攻撃したターゲットの数に等しい追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が攻撃したターゲットの数に等しい追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Asker'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanana dek yaptığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, saldırılan hedeflerin sayısı kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.
